cards.text: An _____ (email / FTP) is a fast, easy, and inexpensive way to send and receive electronic mail with other Internet users around the world.
A ____ (telnet/email) allows a user to log into a remote computer as though it were a local system.
What is the full form of WWW? (World Wide Web / World Wildlife Work)
_____ (Internet Telephony / Internet Relay Chat) allows Internet users to talk across the Internet to any PC equipped to receive the call.
_____ (Internet Relay Chat / Internet Telephony) allows people from all over the world to communicate in a real-time.
URL provides the location of the browser. True or False?
A _____ (webserver/website) is a computer that is connected to the Internet and stores all the websites to be available to everyone.
____ (Web page / Website) is a collection of text, images, graphics, videos, and animations arranged systematically and provides information about a subject.
_____ (FTP / Telnet) allows a user to transfer virtually every kind of file that can be stored on a computer from one Internet-connected computer to another.
A web page is a collection of related websites. True or False?
